metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4540 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper Handling of Exceptional Conditions vulnerability in Daurnimator lua-http library allows Excessive Allocation and a denial of service (DoS) attack to be executed by sending a properly crafted request to the server. This issue affects lua-http: all versions before commit ddab283.

criterions.comment: lua-http: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
